Lakewood.Beachcliff Market Square:
Beachcliff Market Square is a mixed-use open air center situated off of Interstate 90 in Rocky River, Ohio, a suburb outside of Cleveland.
Beachcliff Market Square, the 110,000-square-foot (10,000 m2) shopping center, was built in 1983 and was renovated in October 1988 to support more tenants. The center was redeveloped in November 2006 under Jeffrey R. Anderson Real Estate, Inc.
